body: I've been wanting to make this post, but I've put it off for 10 or so days because making posts is hard. So i'm sudekistheboss, and I just recently joined Avicus, recruited by my friend Evocal and my girlfriend Meowfrees. I enjoy nebula the most out of any gamemode. I've been learning yml for it, actually, although I have no reason to unless I help someone else make a map. I enjoy Homestuck and playing tf2 with my friends. That's all there is about me, I guess. Kinda boring, but hey. How's it going?
